author: arkurth
msg: Updated vSphere_SDK.pm to incorporate most of the changes done by vCenter.pm.
-Updated copy_virtual_disk to attempt to copy the disk by creating a clone VM if the CopyVirtualDisk function is not available on the VM host.

-Updated vm_unregister to be able to accept a VM mo_ref argument in addition to a vmx file path. This allows copy_virtual_disk to be able to call it to unregister the temporary/clone VMs with out having to figure out the vmx path.

author: lu4242
